entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in wind prone areas. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in wind prone areas. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
